column4: Hi, somebody stole my shutdown button... can anyone help me get it back?
try add panel
erm add to panel
No the log out button is there, and I can suspend and hibernate... but not shut down
button gone or not working
gone
I've been searching and I found someone with a similar problem but with kubuntu
right click panel and add to panel green man ..is the only way i know
try that until u find out what happened
I am... thought maybe someone here knows
ya lots of questions around ....you might have to wait a while
It's not a big deal.. just anoying :)
you could also remove the existing applet and add it back in ?
ya i know im like that as well
just created an alternative button with sudo halt
works just fine
niced
so u just attached a command to a button ?
yeah
sweet
just add to panel, create custom button. Command, sudo shutdown
I just need to find the shutdown icon :)
